languages.text: {n}Затянутый в тяжелую броню для подавления беспорядков блюститель с достоинством кивает.{/n} "Мои люди в бою еще не подводили, Ваша Светлость. Все — ветераны из отборной сотни, способные пройтись по кораблю катком от носа до кормы".

{n}Clad in heavy riot armour, the enforcer gives you a dignified nod.{/n} "My men have never faltered in battle, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. All of them are veterans, capable of clearing out a ship from stem to stern."
languages.original_text: {n}Затянутый в тяжелую броню для подавления беспорядков блюститель с достоинством кивает.{/n} "Мои люди в бою еще не подводили, Ваша Светлость. Все — ветераны из отборной сотни, способные пройтись по кораблю катком от носа до кормы".

traits.locale_text: {n}Clad in heavy riot Armor, the enforcer gives you a dignified nod.{/n} "My men have never faltered in battle, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. All veterans, capable of steamrolling a ship from stem to stern."

{n}Clad in heavy riot armour, the enforcer gives you a dignified nod.{/n} "My men have never faltered in battle, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. All of them are veterans, capable of clearing out a ship from stem to stern."

{n}Clad in heavy riot armour, the enforcer gives you a dignified nod.{/n} "My men have never faltered in battle, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. All of them are veterans, capable of clearing out a ship from stem to stern."

{n}Clad in heavy riot armour, the enforcer gives you a dignified nod.{/n} "My men have never faltered in battle, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. All of them are veterans, capable of clearing out a ship from stem to stern."

languages.text: {n}Bajo su armadura pesada antidisturbios, el guardia asiente con dignidad.{/n} «Mis hombres nunca han flaqueado en combate, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Todos ellos son veteranos capaces de barrer una nave de proa a popa».
languages.original_text: {n}Clad in heavy riot armour, the enforcer gives you a dignified nod.{/n} "My men have never faltered in battle, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. All of them are veterans, capable of clearing out a ship from stem to stern."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bajo su armadura pesada antidisturbios, el guardia asiente con dignidad.{/n} «Mis hombres nunca han flaqueado en combate, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Todos ellos son veteranos capaces de barrer una nave de proa a popa».

languages.text: {n}鎧に身を包んだエンフォーサーは、威厳をもって頷く。{/n}「うちの部下は戦いでは、くじけ知らずです、陛下。全員ベテランで、船を隅から隅まで片付ける能力がありますよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Clad in heavy riot armour, the enforcer gives you a dignified nod.{/n} "My men have never faltered in battle, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. All of them are veterans, capable of clearing out a ship from stem to stern."

traits.locale_text: {n}鎧に身を包んだエンフォーサーは、威厳をもって頷く。{/n}「うちの部下は戦いでは、くじけ知らずです、陛下。全員ベテランで、船を隅から隅まで片付ける能力がありますよ」

languages.text: {n}执法者身穿厚重的防暴盔甲，向你庄严地点着头。{/n}“大人，我的人从来不会在战斗中退缩。他们都是老兵，可以把整艘船从头到尾清理得干干净净。”
languages.original_text: {n}Clad in heavy riot armour, the enforcer gives you a dignified nod.{/n} "My men have never faltered in battle, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. All of them are veterans, capable of clearing out a ship from stem to stern."

traits.locale_text: {n}执法者身穿厚重的防暴盔甲，向你庄严地点着头。{/n}“大人，我的人从来不会在战斗中退缩。他们都是老兵，可以把整艘船从头到尾清理得干干净净。”

languages.text: {n}Der Enforcer in seiner schweren Schutzausrüstung nickt dir würdevoll zu.{/n} "Meine Männer haben im Kampf noch nie gewankt, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Sie alle sind Veteranen, die in der Lage sind, ein Schiff vom Bug bis zum Heck zu räumen."
languages.original_text: {n}Clad in heavy riot armour, the enforcer gives you a dignified nod.{/n} "My men have never faltered in battle, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. All of them are veterans, capable of clearing out a ship from stem to stern."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Enforcer in seiner schweren Schutzausrüstung nickt dir würdevoll zu.{/n} "Meine Männer haben im Kampf noch nie gewankt, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Sie alle sind Veteranen, die in der Lage sind, ein Schiff vom Bug bis zum Heck zu räumen."

languages.text: {n}Bardé d'une lourde armure anti-émeute, le prévôt vous adresse un signe de tête digne.{/n} « Mes hommes n'ont jamais failli au combat, Votre Seigneurie. Ce sont tous des vétérans capables de nettoyer un vaisseau de la proue à la poupe. »
languages.original_text: {n}Clad in heavy riot armour, the enforcer gives you a dignified nod.{/n} "My men have never faltered in battle, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. All of them are veterans, capable of clearing out a ship from stem to stern."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bardé d'une lourde armure anti-émeute, le prévôt vous adresse un signe de tête digne.{/n} « Mes hommes n'ont jamais failli au combat, Votre Seigneurie. Ce sont tous des vétérans capables de nettoyer un vaisseau de la proue à la poupe. »

languages.text: {n}Ağır isyan zırhı kuşanmış infazcı, başıyla saygınca onaylıyor.{/n} "Adamlarım muharebede asla bocalamaz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Hepsi gazidir, bir gemiyi başından kıçına temizleyebilirler."
languages.original_text: {n}Clad in heavy riot armour, the enforcer gives you a dignified nod.{/n} "My men have never faltered in battle, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. All of them are veterans, capable of clearing out a ship from stem to stern."
